eu.opends.environment

Class TrafficLightCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.opends.environment.TrafficLightCenter

  • public class TrafficLightCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the management of all traffic lights within a model. It contains a complete list of all traffic lights and a list of traffic light programs for each intersection
    Author:
    Rafael Math

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TrafficLightCenter.TrafficLightMode
      TrafficLightMode indicates which traffic light program is applied for all intersections.
      static class  TrafficLightCenter.TriggerType 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrafficLightCenter(Simulator _sim)
      Setup initializes the traffic light center.

      Closes all internal threads

      Evaluates an XML-string containing traffic light circuits from external sources

      Returns the internal program a given intersection is assigned to.

      When the traffic light trigger was hit and the internal traffic light program is running in TRIGGER mode, green light will be requested at the given traffic light

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrafficLightCenter

        public TrafficLightCenter(Simulator _sim)
        Setup initializes the traffic light center. Traffic light rules will be loaded from a *-tlr.xml file, traffic lights will be loaded from the map model, rules will be attached to traffic lights and traffic light programs will be started
        Parameters:
        _sim - Simulator for map data

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateInstructionString

        public void evaluateInstructionString(java.lang.String datastring)
        Evaluates an XML-string containing traffic light circuits from external sources
        Parameters:
        datastring - XML-file to be processed

      • reportCollision

        public void reportCollision(java.lang.String trafficLightName,
                            TrafficLightCenter.TriggerType type)
        When the traffic light trigger was hit and the internal traffic light program is running in TRIGGER mode, green light will be requested at the given traffic light
        Parameters:
        trafficLightName - Name of traffic light requested to switch to green
        type - Type of trigger (REQUEST or PHASE)

      • getMode

        public TrafficLightCenter.TrafficLightMode getMode()
        Returns current mode of traffic light center
        Returns:
        mode of traffic light center

      • setMode

        public void setMode(TrafficLightCenter.TrafficLightMode _mode)
        Switch off all traffic lights and restart programs in the given mode
        Parameters:
        _mode - new traffic light mode

      • toggleMode

        public void toggleMode()
        Switches to next traffic light mode. If last one was reached, continue with first. Order: TRIGGER --> PROGRAM --> EXTERNAL --> BLINKING --> OFF

      • getTrafficLightByName

        public static TrafficLight getTrafficLightByName(java.lang.String trafficLightName)
        Looks up the traffic light object with the given name. If no object found, null will be returned
        Parameters:
        trafficLightName - name of the traffic light to look up (i.e. "TrafficLight.06_04" without arrow description)
        Returns:
        traffic light object for given input string

      • getTrafficLightByLocation

        public TrafficLight getTrafficLightByLocation(java.lang.String intersectionID,
                                              java.lang.String roadID,
                                              int lane)
        Looks up the traffic light object with the given intersectionID, roadID and lane. If no object found, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        intersectionID - Intersection, where the wanted traffic light is located
        roadID - Road leading to the given intersection
        lane - Lane at given road
        Returns:
        Traffic light at given intersection, road and lane (returns null, if not available)

      • getInternalProgram

        public TrafficLightInternalProgram getInternalProgram(java.lang.String intersectionID)
                                               throws NoInternalProgramException
        Returns the internal program a given intersection is assigned to.
        Parameters:
        intersectionID - ID of the traffic light intersection
        Returns:
        Internal program for given intersectionID
        Throws:
        NoInternalProgramException - If no matching internal program could be found

      • getInternalProgram

        public TrafficLightInternalProgram getInternalProgram(TrafficLight trafficLight)
                                               throws NoInternalProgramException
        Returns the internal program a given traffic light (and thus intersection) is assigned to.
        Parameters:
        trafficLight - traffic light object
        Returns:
        Internal program for given traffic light
        Throws:
        NoInternalProgramException - If no matching internal program could be found

      • updateGlobalStatesString

        public void updateGlobalStatesString()
        Creates a string containing all current traffic light states and sends this string to Lightning

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes all internal threads

      • hasRedTrafficLight

        public static boolean hasRedTrafficLight(Waypoint nextWayPoint)
